title: Salute to Adventurers
author: Buchan, John
snippet: "Of Auchencairn, or what is left of it," I said.

title: Salute to Adventurers
author: Buchan, John
snippet: "Of Auchencairn?" he asked, when I had assented.

title: Salute to Adventurers
author: Buchan, John
snippet: Of aSaturday I would sometimes ride out to Auchencairn to see my mother andassist with my advice the work of Robin Gilfillan.

title: Salute to Adventurers
author: Buchan, John
snippet: A week later I got word that myfather was dead of an ague in the Low Countries, and I had to be offpost-haste to Auchencairn to see to the ordering of our little estate.
